SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) AS "RNO",
B.ID AS "ID", B.BJH AS "BJH", B.MS AS "MS", B.TDJH AS "TDJH", B.TDJMS AS "TDJMS", B.JXBS AS "JXBS", B.GKBS AS "GKBS", B.KNXBS AS "KNXBS", B.ZT AS "ZT", B.DPRTCODE AS "DPRTCODE", B.WHBMID AS "WHBMID", B.WHRID AS "WHRID", B.WHSJ AS "WHSJ", B.REC_XGLX AS "REC_XGLX", B.REC_CZRID AS "REC_CZRID", B.REC_CZSJ AS "REC_CZSJ", B.REC_IP AS "REC_IP", B.REC_CZSM AS "REC_CZSM", B.REC_CZLS AS "REC_CZLS", B.REC_ZBID AS "REC_ZBID", RECWHR.USERNAME||' '||RECWHR.REALNAME AS "REC_CZR_NAME", WHDW.DPRTNAME AS "NEW_WHBM", WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME AS "NEW_WHR", (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END) AS "NEW_ZT" , (CASE WHEN B.JXBS = '00000' THEN '通用' ELSE B.JXBS END) AS "NEW_JXBS" , (CASE WHEN B.GKBS = '00000' THEN '通用' ELSE B.GKBS END) AS "NEW_GKBS" , (CASE WHEN B.KNXBS = 1 THEN '否' WHEN B.KNXBS = 2 THEN '是' END) AS "NEW_KNXBS" ,
(F_GETREC_HD(B.REC_CZSM)) AS "REC_HD", (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) AS "DATA_VERSION"
FROM D_017_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER RECWHR ON RECWHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHBMID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from D_017_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) AS A WHERE 2 >="RNO"
